Interface CompositeParagraph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Paragraph, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Column
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnImpl, CompositeParagraphImpl

    public interface CompositeParagraph
extends Paragraph
    Interface of a CompositeParagraph which consists of multiple SimpleParagraphs
    Author:
    Sebastian
